text:
Hi <@U085EKRUJ75>, the minimum requirements are as follows:
Java Version : 17
Compile Sdk Version : 34
Kotlin Version : 1.9.22
Gradle : 8.4
AGP : 8.2.2
Hi, I run the ios sdk demo project with my chat flow, but I can not open chat dialog. it is always in loading status
I do it in ios simulator
Thanks <@U07JHRHGYBV> for replying, i didn't find anything in the documentation to have a icon like this one, with a message, using the SDK. Can you please help me with that
Hi <@U085EKRUJ75>, you mean the tooltip with the icon, message and the dismiss button?
and the floating circular chat button with dark background, as shown in SS

Hi <@U0865SS46TX> - you should be able to quickly tap five times on the loading animation to get some debugging information. The most common things that cause this is when the particular mobile chatflow hasn't been turned to the "on" status in the portal chatflows (rightmost toggle in its row) or that the mobile tag (in your plist, "default") doesn't match any mobile chatflows that are on. Please check those settings and let us know if there might be something different causing this for you.

Hi <@U085EKRUJ75> - the chat widget previews in mobile chatflow Build and Display tabs are still shown as their web versions and not as an app-framed <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/reference/api/conversations/chat-widget-sdk#inline-embed-styling|inline embedded> version that is in our backlog to update but we will add priority to in light of this question.

If you are interested in an icon overlay to launch the widget, <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C0736Q81QFQ/p1732194324053419|this thread> also has an interest in such functionality for Android. The other pieces of that welcome message from your screenshot (agent avatar and welcome message) aren't readily available from an API at this time but if there's an interest in surfacing that before the web view widget is launched, we can look into the feasibility of at. CC <@U06GS7BG27J> for visibility.
I get message "No matching chatflows in portal 48650731 for targeting parameter default". How can i fix it? <@U07ARLLF39N>
Sorry, I fixed it by turn it on in chat flow settings. thanks very much. <@U07ARLLF39N>

I am working on React Native, by exposing the functionality from native android and ios side
From your reply, it seems no native functionality by SDK is right now provided to have the icon overlay (that launches the chat window view)
Therefore from my understanding i will have to create the ui on RN myself, and for this, the additional pieces of info (like agent avatar and message) can be fetch from an API ( for which you may check the feasibility)

can you please confirm if i got it right?
If yes, i will let you know about the API requirement later on

Thanks!
Thanks <@U0865SS46TX>, I'm glad it's working for you now.

Hi <@U085EKRUJ75> - that sounds correct to me. We are in a slowdown for winter holidays in the U.S. so it may be a week or two before we can investigate an API for this sort of data but please feel free to let us know what you'd be looking for in an API once you have that. Thanks!

Hi <@U07VAD9SL1G> - Thank you for this feedback. We're going to begin looking into the feasibility of adding the option of a close button or mechanism. We'll follow up once we have an update on what we find.
